name: Fynn Levy Presents Crustacean Crustacean Crustacean
name_original: Fynn Levy Presents Crustacean Crustacean Crustacean
description:
Welcome to Fynn Levy Presents Crustacean Crustacean Crustacean! On today's show we'll be following Herm - a young crab on a mission to climb the property ladder!

Talk to other crabs and help them find their perfect shell. Keep trading to climb the property ladder until you reach the top!

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Talk

Mouse - Select options when talking

Alt + F4 - Quit

Credits:

Programming: Michael Bohea, Joni Lev

Character and Environment Art: Nathan Addison, Michael Bohea

Story and Writing: Nathan Addison, Joni Lev, Fynn Levy

Sound and Music: Kenric Yuen 

Made for Global Game Jam 2019.
